Self.Wiki: Determines the configuration of material parameters.

paramName.Wiki: Set the parameter name of the material. Up to 31 characters.

materialId.Wiki: The material expansion paramter ID to use for NPCs. -1 for all materials.

materialParamValue0.Wiki: The material parameter value used for the red component of a color.

materialParamValue1.Wiki: The material parameter value used for the green component of a color.

materialParamValue2.Wiki: The material parameter value used for the blue component of a color.

materialParamValue3.Wiki: The material parameter value used for the alpha component of a color.

materialParamValue4.Wiki: The material parameter value used for intensity.
